1.content:
It was Friday, the last day of a long year, my last year of four spent at Smalltown High School. It was also, in fact, the last day of my normal life. The school was in a state of chaos because it was the last day of school, and everyone was ready to start their vacation. I was SO ready to get out of there... but it was not to be. Just as school let out, I was surrounded by a strange white glow, and an unusual chill surrounded my body. I watched in awe as I saw my surroundings grow larger and larger. It was about this time that I freaked out, and shortly after that that I passed out. When I awoke, I found myself on a soft, sweet-smelling surface.

"Hello there, little man. We're going to have a lot of fun this summer." I knew that voice! It was...
1.title: The Last Day

12.content:
I looked up and saw Katie, this beautiful redheaded freshman, looking down at me. Now, I don't know about you, but I always supposed that if I ever found myself looking up at the face of a girl I knew, but the face was now that of a giantess, I wouldn't react in a calm manner. But that's exactly how I felt. I rolled to one side and found that that the soft, sweet-smelling surface was Katie's hand, which I was draped over. I assumed the smell was the peach scented hand lotion that Katie used from time to time. I turned on my back and smiled lazily at Katie.
"So, Katie, when did you become a giant?" It was still amazing that I was just so blase about the whole thing.
Katie (Actually, it's Kathleen O'Brien, and she's originally from Shannon, Ireland, though she moved her when she was eight, and still has a hint of an Irish brogue) laughed gently.
"It's not me who grew, Chris, it's you who shrunk, and down to four inches at that."
I shrugged nonchalantly, as if I shrunk down to four inches every day of the week.
"How did you do that?"
"Well, my grandmother sent me a spell. I thought it was pretty wild, at first, but my grandmother...well, let's say she can be very uncanny at times. So, since you're one of the cuter boys I know, I thought I'd experiment on you. And what do you know, if it didn't work. There's also a calming effect that the spell makes, but that wears off in a little while, after you've had a chance to adjust."
I nodded, finding my shrinking intellectually interesting.
"How long does the shrinking part of the spell last?"
"Until I use the counterspell."
"So what are your plans?"
"I thought..."

I could see the answer wasn't the one Katie wanted, but she seemed to accept it nonetheless.
"Well, at least I know the spell works," Katie said to me, "and maybe I can find someone who will find that prospect intriguing. But since you're not the one, I'll go ahead and unshrink you and make you forget all about this."
"I won't remember a thing?"
Katie smiled. "Nope, this won't even be a dream to you. Just the hint of a forgotten dream, maybe."


* * *

The next thing I knew I was waking up to the sunlight hitting my face from my bedroom window. I shook my head, trying to remember this bizarre dream I was having. But it stayed just out of reach. I grinned. No reason to waste my summer worrying about old dreams. I had a couple of months to enjoy before I entered college.
It was a great summer, and I had a lot of fun. One of the odd things that happened that summer, though, was John Varkis dating Kathleen O'Brien. Kathleen was cute, even for a freshman, but John was going to be a senior next year, as well as the starting quarterback for Smallville's football team. The sun was coming in through my bedroom window as I shook my head awake. I had had the weirdest dream, but for some reason, I just couldn't remember what it had been about. Oh, well, summer vacation was starting, and I meant to enjoy every minute before college started.
The oddest thing happened to me all summer, though. I kept on running into this freshman by the name of Kathleen O'Brien, or Katie, as she liked to be called. I would smile at her in passing, she would smile back, then start giggling before she turned away.

Katie, of course, sees through my deception.

Hey everybody, as of this writing, summer vacation has just begun, and I would like to make my first submission one that glorifies that wonderful season... Plus I love GTS

The main character's name is Chris, he is a high school senior.

That's the only description I'm making here, I want to see where the story goes.
